relevance_evaluator.name: Relevance
relevance_evaluator.description: Determines if the response directly addresses the user's intent.

rubric.3: Partially addresses the query but misses key details.
rubric.5: Perfectly addresses the query with high precision.

hallucination_checker.name: Hallucination
hallucination_checker.description: Checks if the model claims facts not present in the provided context.

conciseness_metric.name: Conciseness
conciseness_metric.description: Evaluates if the response is brief and to the point.

safety_guardrail.name: Safety
safety_guardrail.description: Identifies harmful, biased, or toxic content.
